definition: to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: The degree of specialization is open to a group army .
sentences.chinese: 金地是专业化程度极强的一支集团军。

sentences.english: It's like the difference between aninfantry squad and an Army Group.
sentences.chinese: 这就好比是步兵班和集团军群的差异。

sentences.english: NATO's CENTAG covering the vital East-West German border is attacked.
sentences.chinese: 北约中央集团军所涵盖的东西德边界要地遭到了攻击。

sentences.english: I'm not supposed to be commanding this Army.
sentences.chinese: 我既不统率第三集团军，也不在英国。

definition: war zone/combat zone/(military) theater of operations
geographical area of command/(PLA) military district
wing (of an air force)/sports team representing a combination of entities (e.g. United Korea)
expeditionary force/army on a distant expedition
